description: Time-based animated camera movements. Frontend runs a 30fps setInterval loop that sends CAMSHOT and CAMSTREAM commands with values computed from math functions. Same architecture as animated post processing on the Directors Cut page.

mechanism.toggle: Click to start, click again to stop. Only one animation active at a time.
mechanism.persistence: Animation survives page navigation via module-level refs

animations.name: Shake
animations.description: Handheld camera shake effect with randomized position/rotation offsets
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.Medium once, then applies random X/Y/Z offsets (-3 to 3) and pitch/yaw offsets (-2 to 2) every frame

animations.name: Wave
animations.description: Smooth up and down bobbing motion
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.Medium once, then sin(t) drives Y offset 0-30 with slight pitch offset

animations.name: Dutch Tilt
animations.description: Rocking roll rotation for dramatic effect
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.Medium once, then sin(t) drives roll offset -15 to 15 degrees

animations.name: High/Low Sweep
animations.description: Alternates between high angle and low angle shots
animations.update: Switches between CAMSHOT.HighAngle and CAMSHOT.LowAngle at midpoint of each cycle

animations.name: Angle Cycle
animations.description: Cycles through high, default, and low angles
animations.update: 4-phase cycle: HighAngle -> Default -> LowAngle -> Default, 4s each

animations.name: Distance Cycle
animations.description: Cycles through close, medium, and wide shots

animations.name: Dolly Zoom
animations.description: Smooth push-in and pull-out along the Z axis
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.Medium once, then sin(t) drives Z offset for push-in/pull-out motion

animations.name: Breathing
animations.description: Subtle breathing motion with gentle Z-axis movement
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.Close once, then gentle sin(t) drives small Z offset for breathing feel

animations.name: Rising Shot
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.LowAngle once, then linear Y ramp upward with pitch adjustment to keep subject framed

animations.name: Descending Shot
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.HighAngle once, then linear Y ramp downward with pitch adjustment

animations.name: Zoom Reveal
animations.description: Pull back from extreme close to wide shot reveal
animations.update: 3-phase: ExtremeClose (4s) -> Close (4s) -> WideShot (4s) for dramatic reveal

animations.name: Dramatic Push
animations.update: Sets CAMSHOT.Medium once, then rapid linear Y/Z ramp for aggressive push-in
